name: A Box of Bullets
description:
Play as Kara, a young survivour living in a world run by the undead. After tracking down the man who stole her ammo, it is up to  to get it back. Walk through a forgotten shopping mall equipped with nothing but a torch to get your ammo back.

This is a walking simulator game that tells a story about Kara tracking down a man who stole her ammunition. Walking through this game, you will expect to see different objects you are able walk up to and have the title and description of the object appear on the screen (there are a few Easter Eggs in this game too).

Movement Controls:

W - Forward

S  - Backward

A - Left

D - Right

Please leave a review
